5.1. Base Scenario¶

Base scenario for artifact-based build. Includes 5 stages:

  1. prepare
  2. build
  3. test
  4. publish
  5. clean
fuel_ci.scenarios.base.prepare(objects)[source]¶

Clones all repos, downloads all artifacts and unpacks them

Parameters:objects – dict of objects loaded from YAML
